data.title: Sodagreen 20th anniversary concert
data.meta_description: Taiwanese band Sodagreen's 20th anniversary concert in Beijing on June 22-23, 2024 at Huaxi Live·Wukesong. Celebrating two decades of music with their six-member lineup, featuring hits from their career. Ticket prices range from 380 RMB to 1580 RMB.
data.text:
Taiwanese band Sodagreen will hold its 20th anniversary concert in Beijing at Huaxi Live·Wukesong on June 22 and 23, 2024.

Since their last tour in 2016, Sodagreen returns with their six-member lineup for this special concert. Celebrating twenty years of music, this event marks a rare intersection with them. After a three-year break, Sodagreen has reached its twentieth anniversary since debut. This concert is a celebration through music, featuring all the songs that have accompanied lives over the past twenty years—from their self-titled album "Sodagreen", "Little Universe", "Incomparable Beauty", "What is Troubling You", "Vivaldi Project", and recent hits. It’s a moment to cherish two decades of memories. The Sodagreen 20th Anniversary Concert is coming soon.

Venue: Huaxi Live·Wukesong

Address: No. 69, Fuxing Lu (Rd), Haidian District, Beijing

Dates: June 22, 2024 (Saturday) / June 23, 2024 (Sunday), 19:00

Ticket Price: 380 RMB - 1580 RMB
